name: Sathya Narrayanan
body:
Hi, I am sathya, I use to most of my time hacking open source projects. I am the author of projects such as

* [Mongo Models](https://github.com/RevelutionWind/MDB)
* [NumSys](https://github.com/plasmashadow/numsys)
* [PyHttp](https://github.com/plasmashadow/pyhttp)

Most of my work are based on python, node.js, c/c++.

## What I work on ?

1. websockets.
2. webrtc.
3. Mathematics.


## Across the Web

* [Email](plasmashadowx@gmail.com)
